titles.title: Impeaching Merrick Brian Garland, Attorney General of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
Impeaching Merrick Brian Garland, Attorney General of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches Attorney General Merrick Garland for high crimes and misdemeanors relating to investigating threats against school personnel and to a conflict of interest.
